content.data:
License Profiles allow you to save multiple profiles containing groups 
 of Licenses which can then be selected when starting up the application.

In the dialog, enable  Use 
	 License Profiles . 
 Enter a  Profiles Location . Use 
	 the  Browse  button to select a directory, if required. 
 Click  Ask For Profile On Startup  
	 to ensure that a profile is selected when starting an application. 
 Select the  Current Profile  to 
	 be used from the drop-down list. 
 Select  Save  to save an new or 
	 existing profile or  Save As  to make a copy of the current profile. 
 Click  Delete  to remove the selected 
	 profile.
